short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for Telarus employees to automatically refresh any List or Dashboard view in SalesForce.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension works on:
-Case Queue
-Task Queue
-My Case Queue
And a whole bunch more of task views!

NEW! This now works on Dashboards


This extension is for Telarus employee's. Its has not been tested, and there is no guaranty that it will work else where.
